Async[source]

Async(func:Callable)

JS style async tool def download_file(url): ... return path

download_async = Async(download_file)

download_async(url) .then(lambda x: os.system(f"tar -xvf {path}")) .catch(logging.error)

{% endraw %}

JS style async

{% raw %} 
def some_long(x):
    """took long calc"""
    if x>0:
        for i in range(x):
            some_long(x-1)
    return x
{% endraw %}
